pageTitle: Book Apartment in Amsterdam from $121 at 9flats.com
textBeforeTable: Read more The bathroom is white & fresh. The comfortable and centric Sarpahtipark Apartment 3 can house two guests and it's on the first floor. The cosy sleeping area is fitted out with a double bed and for your entertainment there is a Flat Screen TV. The dining table for two is next to the kitchen which is fully equipped with everything you might need to prepare your own meals and a dishwasher for your comfort. The Sarpahtipark Apartment 3 has a subtle blend of contemporary and casual cool. The relaxing colours and spaces flooding with light, convey a sweet serenity which makes this studio apartment a haven in the city centre. Is all about minimalist living to the max, the Sarpahtipark Apartment 3 has been thoughtfully decorated for your convenience and pleasure.
